title: (x) compressed Gill Sans-like "studiumgenerale" - Agenda {Lari Elovainio}
content:
I am trying to identify this font. Is it some meta-relative?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [studgen.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824002542/http:/typophile.com/files/studgen.gif) | 8.5 KB |
author: mirimiri2

comments.content:
Hi Miriam

Nice isn't it? Lari's right, of course, but the other one that is very like this is the old Monotype extra condensed version of Gill Sans.

Thanks for your help, this is a very savvy forum. Kind of a late response from my part.  
I somewhat expected to get notified by email in case someone answered my thread. Is that something that can be "turned on" as a preference?

You could subscribe to the RRS feed of the topic, it’ll do the same trick. But you’d need an RSS reader.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824002542im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture-1_5024.png)
